description: Impose pre-industrial (1850) emissions of tropospheric ozone precursors excluding lightning NOx  (oxides of nitrogen).
name: 1850 Tropospheric Ozone Precursor Emissions excluding Lightning NOx
rationale: Near Term Climate Forcers (NTCF): tropospheric ozone precursors.
longName: 1850 emissions of tropospheric ozone precursors excluding lightning NOx
keywords: pre-industrial, 1850, tropospheric ozone precursors, emissions, exclude Lightning NOx
